verses.plain: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the LORD from the heavens: praise him in the heights.

tokens.t: Praise ye the
. Praise ye the
from the heavens: praise him in the heights.

verses.plain: Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.

tokens.t: Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.

verses.plain: Praise ye him, sun and moon: praise him, all ye stars of light.

tokens.t: Praise ye him, sun and moon: praise him, all ye stars of light.

verses.plain: Praise him, ye heavens of heavens, and ye waters that be above the heavens.

tokens.t: Praise him, ye heavens of heavens, and ye waters that
above the heavens.

verses.plain: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for he commanded, and they were created.

tokens.t: Let them praise the name of the
: for he commanded, and they were created.

verses.plain: He hath also stablished them for ever and ever: he hath made a decree which shall not pass.

tokens.t: He hath also stablished them for ever and ever: he hath made a decree which shall not pass.

verses.plain: Praise the LORD from the earth, ye dragons, and all deeps:

tokens.t: Praise the
from the earth, ye dragons, and all deeps:

verses.plain: Fire, and hail; snow, and vapour; stormy wind fulfilling his word:

tokens.t: Fire, and hail; snow, and vapour; stormy wind fulfilling his word:

verses.plain: Mountains, and all hills; fruitful trees, and all cedars:

tokens.t: Mountains, and all hills; fruitful trees, and all cedars:

verses.plain: Beasts, and all cattle; creeping things, and flying fowl:

tokens.t: Beasts, and all cattle; creeping things, and flying fowl:

verses.plain: Kings of the earth, and all people; princes, and all judges of the earth:

tokens.t: Kings of the earth, and all people; princes, and all judges of the earth:

verses.plain: Both young men, and maidens; old men, and children:

tokens.t: Both young men, and maidens; old men, and children:

verses.plain: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for his name alone is excellent; his glory is above the earth and heaven.

tokens.t: Let them praise the name of the
: for his name alone is excellent; his glory
above the earth and heaven.

verses.plain: He also exalteth the horn of his people, the praise of all his saints; even of the children of Israel, a people near unto him. Praise ye the LORD.

footnotes.text: Praise ye the LORD. Praise: Heb. Hallelujah, etc
